36.ara-name: كتاب الزهد عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Mu'adh binJabal narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) said:"Allah, the Mighty and Sublime, said: 'Those who love each other for the sake of My Majesty shall be upon podiums of light, and they will be admired by the Prophets and the martyrs

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْحُبِّ فِي اللَّهِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Loving For The Sake Of Allah
